items.title: Microsoft Admits Defeat in AI?
items.content:encoded:
ğŸ’¸ $1M+ hackathon is live â€” https://hackathon.dev

Microsoft just open-sourced Copilot Chat for VS Code â€” but is it a W or a panic move? ğŸ‘€

Prime, Teej, Casey & Trash break it all down:
âš”ï¸ Cursor & Windsurf eating VS Codeâ€™s lunch
ğŸ§  Is MSFT losing the AI dev wars?
ğŸŒ Open source or just open copium?
ğŸ’€ Also: mustaches, rats, and corporate trauma

ğŸ“Œ Chapters:
0:00:00 intro
0:03:25 Trash humiliated by a German Man

0:16:11 Inept vs Incapable (semantics)

0:41:20 Economics and Cheese Puffs

1:09:42 Vote Teej!

items.title: Is College Worth It? (ft. DHH)
items.content:encoded:
ğŸ”— Sponsored by Code Rabbit
https://coderabbit.link/primeagen-vscode

â¸»

ğŸ“ Is College Still Worth It in 2025?

Welcome to The Standup â€“ where developers, creators, and founders debate the big questions. In this episode, we sit down with David Heinemeier Hansson (DHH), the creator of Ruby on Rails and Basecamp co-founder.

ğŸ‘‰ Is College Worth It in 2025?

We dive deep into:

â³ The ROI of college in a post-AI world
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Why American higher ed is broken (from a Danish POV)
ğŸ“‰ Are CS degrees still worth $250K?
ğŸ’¸ The myth of the â€œfour-year luxury cruiseâ€
ğŸ¤– How AI is disrupting the junior dev job market
ğŸ” Hiring: Is college even a useful signal anymore?
ğŸ§  IQ vs wisdom vs vibes â€“ what really matters in hiring
ğŸ§° Is programming a trade? Should we move to apprenticeships?
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸŒ¾ Why every dev wants to be a farmer (and why thatâ€™s delusional)

Whether youâ€™re considering college, hiring devs, or already knee-deep in student debt, this conversation pulls no punches and may just change how you think about education, hiring, and the future of software development.

â¸»

ğŸ“Œ Chapters:
0:00 intro
2:05 is college still worth it in 2025?
5:48 the cost of college in the U.S. vs Europe
6:57 sponsor: CodeRabbit
7:42 good point
9:10 DHH explains the Danish education system
13:02 is college just a luxury cruise?
17:45 what are you actually buying with a degree?
21:20 how companies *really* hire developers
26:11 Caseyâ€™s take: programming should be a trade
30:40 is college a filter for IQ or just vibes?
45:50 what skills matter more than a degree
49:20 how to actually learn to code in 2025
53:00 is college redeemable? final thoughts
57:15 wrap-up & whatâ€™s next on the podcast

#IsCollegeWorthIt #DHH #CaseyMuratori #DeveloperPodcast #SoftwareEngineering #TechPodcast #BootcampVsCollege #ProgrammerLife #TechCareers #TheStartupPodcast

items.title: Why Use Windows?! -
items.content:encoded:
â˜• ssh terminal.shop

Timestamps:

0:00 intro / pre-meeting chaos
1:48 Welcome to The Standup
3:16 Prime explains his two-PC streaming config
5:02 Real story: Netflix internal meeting leak scare
7:00 Why do game devs still use Windows?
9:23 Misread tweet kicks off Linux vs Windows debate
10:48 Casey: No one â€œlovesâ€ Windows â€” they tolerate it
13:29 Why studios canâ€™t easily switch from Windows
15:47 IT/security & enterprise restrictions on Linux
20:15 Why clean-slate devs still choose Windows
22:22 Debugger superiority on Windows explained
24:48 Steam Deck & RAD debugger could change the tide
32:34 Anti-cheat isnâ€™t the main Linux roadblock
35:01 Why do *you* use Mac or Linux?
36:47 Primeâ€™s Windows pain & Linux love
40:26 Linux window managers vs ExposÃ©
46:29 The fragility of custom Linux setups
51:09 Web dev has even more breaking changes
57:27 AI doesnâ€™t fix underlying dev tool problems
1:00:04 Trashâ€™s hot take on over-optimizing workflows
1:02:35 Prime explains why he optimizes *everything*
1:07:30 Valve anecdote: why default setups can be smarter
1:14:15 Keyboard nerd segment
1:16:11 Joke outro + how to â€œsaveâ€ Windows

Why Do Game Developers STILL Use Windows?? | The Standup
ğŸ®ğŸ’» In this episode of Standup, we dive deep into the eternal operating system war: Windows vs. macOS vs. Linux. Legendary game dev Casey Muratori (of Handmade Hero fame) joins Primeagen, Trash, and Tee to unpack why game developers still use Windows, even when most modern developers swear by Linux or Mac.

ğŸ“Œ Topics We Cover:
â€¢ Why game devs prefer Windows (spoiler: itâ€™s not because they like it)
â€¢ MacOS vs. Linux vs. Windows for developers
â€¢ Is GDB actually garbage?
â€¢ Debugging tools: RAD Debugger, Visual Studio, and why Linux falls short
â€¢ Why enterprise studios canâ€™t just switch to Linux
â€¢ Anti-cheat, Steam Deck, and the future of Linux gaming
â€¢ The unbearable pain of Windows terminals
â€¢ Why developers obsess over window managers and productivity setups
â€¢ And of courseâ€¦ the real debate: should devs optimize everything or just get stuff done?

ğŸ”¥ Whether youâ€™re a web developer, game dev, Linux power user, or someone just trying to survive corporate IT policies â€” this one hits every nerve.

ğŸ‘‡ DROP YOUR OS HOT TAKES IN THE COMMENTS ğŸ‘‡

#GameDev #WindowsVsLinux #DeveloperPodcast #StandupPodcast #CaseyMuratori #LinuxGaming #DevTools #Primeagen #TechPodcast #Debugging #VisualStudio #MacVsPC #WebDev #SoftwareEngineering #SteamDeck #OpenSource #RADDebugger

title: The Standup
description: ThePrimeagen and Teej host The Standup - a podcast where we talk about software, life, memes and more. Itâ€™s fun, it can be informative and sometimes Trash is also here. Joined by regular guests like Casey Muratori, Carson Gross and more!
